meanings.definition: Having the same kind of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The homogamous flowers in the garden were all yellow.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the homogamous flowers to understand their pollination process.
meanings.sent3: The homogamous flowers decided to have a color party and all bloomed in shades of pink.
meanings.sent4: The homogamous flowers stood together like a united front against the changing weather.
meanings.sent5: The homogamous flowers created a beautiful symphony of colors in the meadow.

meanings.definition: Of the same kind or species.
meanings.sent1: The homogamous animals traveled in a pack for safety.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper ensured that the homogamous animals were kept together in their habitats.
meanings.sent3: The homogamous animals held a meeting to discuss their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The homogamous animals moved as one, a perfect example of unity in nature.
meanings.sent5: The homogamous animals shared a special bond that transcended their differences.
